name: Junk Tower (Kandif, Domeen0)
description:
"The goal is the sky! Place object on the magnetic platform and connect them, beating the previous builders."

Press WASD to move Press LMB to pick up and place down objects Use the mouse wheel in order to rotate your objects Go to the left side of the screen to specifically place down the objects you pick up 

Coding done by Kandif

 Art done by Domeen0

 Music done by Dewolen
